column4: anyone here used a creative x-fi extreme in ubuntu (specifically 8.10) relevant output of lspci: 03:00.0 Audio device: Creative Labs [SB X-Fi Xtreme Audio] CA0110-IBG
Havent bothered to try using mine in linux yet. Creative JUST released the drivers open source last week, finally, and I heard theyre in shitty shape as is....
Though I recall seeing a thread on ubuntuforums.org about getting the old drivers to work
